title: Guitar Lessons
description:
Guitar exercises, beginner to master. Very helpful for playing any style music. Takes a bit of self discipline, but improve your techinque with these exercises. John Petrucci, Ron Thal, Chris Godin, Shaun Baxter, and more. Audio clips, and practice tracks included.

Topics:
-Modes of Major Scale
-Arepeggios
-Alternate Picking
-Legato
-Economy Picking
-Sweeping
-Tapping
-8 Finger Tapping
-Soloing
-Slapping (guitar)
-Melodies




Some of these exercises require software available for free: (lessons ending in PTB, GP*)
Windows, OSX, and *nix
 <a href="
http://www.tuxguitar.com.ar/download.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.tuxguitar.com.ar/download.html</a>

---------------------

May I also recommend Audacity - free recording/editing software; record the exercises weekly to track your progress.

Windows, OSX, and *nix <a href="
http://audacity.sourceforge.net/download/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://audacity.sourceforge.net/download/</a>




File types include, but aren't limited to:
PDF, JPG, MP3, GP*, PTB, AVI, BMP
